company_name: AGUT DE BENLLOCH TURRONES Y MAZAPANES
information: Small family-run business making turron and marzipan, our year-round production uses traditional methods. It is possible to taste our traditional products on-site whilst watching them being made, always using top quality ingredients. Our TURRONS and MARZIPANS are all made the traditional way. Our specialities include: hard and soft turron, with chocolate or guirlache (a type of nougat). Three-flavour turron, hard turron with almonds.
